Title: Prohibits utility service terminations in multiple dwellings
Summary: Prohibits utility service terminations in multiple dwellings; authorizes utility companies to seek a lien against such multiple dwelling for the amount of unpaid utility bills.
LawCode: Amd §235-a, RP L; amd §§33 & 116, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the public service law, in relation to prohibiting utility service terminations in multiple dwellings
